text:

1976 Nat’l Emergencies Act gave Congress a “legislative veto.” But SCOTUS later ruled it was unconstitutional

Now Sen. Mike Lee proposes that emergency declaration should expire after 30 days unless Congress concurs

author: davidjoachim

text:
A common error:

The internet didn't just turn 30

The web did

https://www.washingtonpost.com/opinions/the-internet-just-turned-30-were-celebrating-with-anti-tech-fervor/2019/03/15/e7433980-4694-11e9-aaf8-4512a6fe3439_story.html …
author: davidjoachim

text:
Here's what I don't get about the veto:

 Congress gave POTUS the power to declare national emergencies

 But it said, hey, we reserve the right to rescind that power if it's misused

So...

 When Congress does move to rescind it, why does POTUS get a veto?

cc: @hillhulse
author: davidjoachim

text:
